title: [Forum Game] Make a champion god tier
body:
So basically, the title says it all, the aim of the game is to take a champion, and buff it to god tier levels, then you pick a champion for the next person to buff, and so on for as long as this thread remains relevant, ok? I'll start with an example:

Person 1 says Sivir.

me:
Q: Sivir gains bonus movement speed while her Boomerang Blade is out.

Braum.

Happy buffing, and, also try to keep the unnecessarily trollish buffs to yourself, and don't backtrack to earlier patches, because that is bland and un-creative.

So since he's been mentioned already, lets start with Braum.

Best played in chronological order.

replies.body:
You really think that was a proper response, i certainly dont.

Volibear.

Volibear is unbearable.

{{champion:98}}

Mundo can go where he pleases, allowing him to walk through terrain.

Wukong

Urgot...teleports whole enemy team into his team's nexus obelisk range

lee sin

You didn't pick a champion, so I will assume you said Jarvan IV.

Don't change anything.

Urgot.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=klnXrgfE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-10T08:08:25.396+0000)
>
> You didn't pick a champion, so I will assume you said Jarvan IV.

Actually, they did.

> lets start with Braum.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=klnXrgfE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-10T08:20:31.604+0000)
>
> Actually, they did.

Someone needs to change to chronological order.

Soraka Q activates instantly, and all areas count as the middle
{{champion:34}}

Activating her Q allows her to shoot Super Mega Death Rockets.
Still at 20 mana cost.
And yes, this worked with Runaan's.

Soraka.

stays invisible
forever

jinx

You cannot bear Volibear.

Nah, just kidding, I will give you a better Volibear one then.
Volibear's bite on Frenzy also scales with his maximum size, so if he buys an Elixir of Iron or gets ultied by Lulu he bites twice as much out of his enemy!

Evelynn
op he just did voli

Shens ult now scales off 25% of his max health.

Volibear.

Leona can proc Sunlight herself, and it scales off 50% AP now.

Volibear.

Shaco survives if he is killed and his clone is still alive.

Leona.

Yorick now summons 2 ghouls per spell cast, instead of one.

{{champion:35}}

Ult now available from level 1 with low, almost non-existent cooldown. Please Rito!

{{champion:83}}

Vel'koz's passive now additionally scales off of 40% of his max AP.

{{champion:133}}

The male champions are all transphobic now and freak out about her having balls.

{{champion:161}}

Ult is instant instead of channel.

{{champion:266}}

Zin Zhao has AP scaling on his self-heals and is the new Riven.

{{champion:25}}

Dash applies a stun and has no cd.

{{champion:5}}

Reksai now gains 30% attack damage when her Q is activated, and for every auto attack dealt. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 2 seconds.

Sejuani

Rammus dash goes thourgh units.
There is no knockup buffer.

Reksai.

maokais passive works on spellcast not auto. also his ult is back to old version.

sion

Shen's Q now restores health instantly as opposed to over time.

Maokai.

Feast no longer caps at 6 stacks

Shen

Fiora's Ult now hits all Enemy Champs on the Map.

Cho'Gath

Rengar can now leap to allied champs, minions and wards with his passive. Additionally the passive jump range is increased to 1000 units and his ult passively grants him increased visibility range (3300 units) well in the brush.

Fiora

Warwick's ult now crits.

Rengar.

Taric's ult does global damage to all enemy minions, champions and towers, and blinds the screens of enemy players for the full duration of the ultimate.

Warwick

All of Sona's Aura ranges are increased to 600 units.

Taric.

Braum
Q: now passes through units

Fizz

e - restores mana based on how many opponents it hits. 

Sona

Malphite's ult is now truely unstoppable and he will continue to travel forward destroying all minions, turrets, nexuses etc.. in his way until he goes off the map. A which point he dies, which can stop his ult.

Singed

> [{quoted}](name=SlimyDan,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=klnXrgfE,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2015-02-10T23:26:15.690+0000)
>
> Malphite's ult is now truely unstoppable and he will continue to travel forward destroying all minions, turrets, nexuses etc.. in his way until he goes off the map. A which point he dies, which can stop his ult.
> 
> Singed

Singed has a skarner ult, so he can force people to chase him

Jinx is immune to CC while her passive is up.

Yi.

Yi has a devourer effect attached to his passive, and all magic damage he deals can critically strike.

Malphite.

Xerath's has infinite Shots in his Ultimate, Additionally he can move while casting them.

Jinx

Malzahar can float higher, allowing him to bypass terrain and stand above skillshots.

Xerath

Azir's soldiers now move.

Malzahar.

Heimerdinger now places nexus turrets wherever he wants.

Azir.
Okay people keep forgetting to put champions at the end of their posts so lets reset the game with the lord of fuzziness himself, Heimerdinger! (who were you thinking?)

Braum... well
1.5 second cooldown on the q winters bite and no mana...
